name: U96
description:
U96 is a action-roguelike about deep sea exploration. Dive into the deep waters of the Pacific Ocean in the U96 bathyscaphe on a treasure hunt. Far under the water are gems that are waiting for you! However, be careful, because they are guarded by marine life. Collect all the treasures, defeat all the enemies and leave
the adventure alive and with a whole bunch of emeralds.

In the game you are waiting for:
-Precious Treasures
-Cool bathyscaphe
-20 randomly generated levels
-Many enemies
-Cool pixel art
-Atmosphere of the underwater world
